website_summaries.verdict: Chock full of extras, this wheeled dry erase board is both sturdy and flexible, converting to a wall-mounted unit if needed.
pros: The wheels lock in place, as does the double-sided whiteboard
Add-ons include colored markers, magnets, eraser, and ruler
Very lightweight for its size, and easy to assemble
Customer service is responsive when contacted about missing directions or shipping damage
cons: Some users report small dents or dings in the board, possibly damaged in the warehouse or during shipping

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control issues.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good board but QC not there. One side of the board has a decent sized bubble in it. I'm fine just using one side, and I don't want to through the hassle of a return, so I'm going to keep it. It's disappointing though, and hopefully not a sign of things up come. Everything else about the board seems good. Putting it together was pretty easy, it seems very stable, and it's pretty handsome for a whiteboard. If you get one without a bubble you'll be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable to the programs I run
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up nicely, but I am careful to take good care of the surface. The tray breaks off...unbuttons from the screws. Needs washers to secure properly. The rolling wheels have on occasion fallen off too. Other than those small annoyances...the size, double sided & magnetic features, and overall appearance are great. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: shorebird8

customer_reviews.title: Good board but has a flaw
customer_reviews.text: The board is nice on one side and is very sturdy. It was not hard to put together. But on the other side there is two long big bubbles in the middle of the board. It is not a huge deal so I won't go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalKitsune

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Couple little things...
customer_reviews.text: Overall super heavy duty ready to rock. A couple things preventing 5 stars. As other's have said no instructions so flying a little blind results in things (questions?) like do i put the casters with the locks on the back or the front? But eventually you'll power through. Only real ding is the screws that hold the tray in place don't grab on to anything, they just spin. So the tray is precarious at best. I got one screw to sort of stick so the tray will stay on but wobbles and wont support much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Cadillacula

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the most incredible whiteboard I've ever owned, and I've owned a bunch. I kept this thing in my office, but when I closed my business, I brought it home with me. Now I use it to write to-do's, affirmations, quotes, and other positive things that I want to see every day.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to assemble is in the box. No joke. The tools you need to assemble come with. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: tried to order twice, damaged twice
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this at work and was very disappointed that the whiteboard was damaged both times I received. The shipping box was ok, however the whiteboard was bubbled across the entire board (long streaks of raised areas). After reading all the good reviews I would have expected a better product.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of quality went into this product. That is obvious. Very easy to assemble, works like a charm. Would recommend very highly.
customer_reviews.author: walker

customer_reviews.title: Great board but arrived bent on one side.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this board but it came bent on one side. Thankfully it didn't impact us putting it together. It was too big to return and we needed it so we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looked good but had to return. Arrived damaged with a bubble/ripple going across board
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and it came defective. The company did replace it asap, however the replacement was defective as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Foust

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Came in well packed box, delivered on time, over all great product
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Dry Erase board is cheap flimsy and damaged/rippled
customer_reviews.text: This is the flimsiest dry erase board I’ve ever seen and the board itself came with ripples in it. Disappointed I fell for all the good and more than likely fake reviews. Product looks cheap, and surprise surprise it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Albie Serur

customer_reviews.title: poor choice
customer_reviews.text: board arrived warped and returned. I then reordered and it was still warped. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garris

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The package didn’t include marker, earsser, magnet and ruler. The white board was missing wheels and other parts.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher1

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bubbles in the surface
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher so this was ordered through my school money through our front office, so returning is not a very EASY option for me. Both sides of the board have terrible bubbles in the presentation surface. Looks terrible in the light. Super OCD art teacher and it looks awful. I guess I am stuck with it though. Put it together and I'm just grinding my teeth when I look at it.. The frame is very good and sturdy but the board is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna Raxter

customer_reviews.title: Frame coating is not durable and wears almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Whatever process they use to coat the stand/frame included with this board is not sufficient. soon after I received this product, visible imperfections on the surface became visible and get worse over time. Think 'bubbling', paint flaking off and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Really great size and function for the price listed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Bishop
